Ingredients.1: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate (such as Minute Maid®), thawed

Ingredients.3: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can tequila (such as Cuervo® Especial)

Ingredients.4: 0.5 (12 fluid ounce) can brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)

Ingredients.6: 1 pinch kosher salt for rimming glasses

Directions.1: Pour limeade concentrate into a pitcher. Fill can with cold water and pour into the pitcher; repeat twice more (3 cans of water). Fill the can with tequila, and pour into the pitcher; fill half the can with orange liqueur, and pour into the pitcher. Stir well and chill thoroughly.

Directions.2: Serve over ice in salt-rimmed glasses. Garnish with lime wedges.
